scripts.install:all: npm run install:core && npm run install:customer && npm run install:admin && npm run install:ticketing && npm run install:reservations && npm run install:payment
scripts.install:admin: cd admin-module/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.install:ticketing: cd ticketing-module/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.install:agenda: cd agenda-module/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.install:sales: cd sales-pipeline-module/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "core,customer,admin-api,admin-ui" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta" "npm run dev:core" "npm run dev:customer" "npm run dev:admin-backend" "npm run dev:admin-frontend"
scripts.dev:ticketing: concurrently -n "api,ui" "cd ticketing-module/backend && npm run dev" "cd ticketing-module/frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:full: concurrently -n "core,customer,admin-api,admin-ui,ticket-api,reserv-api" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan,red" "npm run dev:core" "npm run dev:customer" "npm run dev:admin-backend" "npm run dev:admin-frontend" "cd ticketing-module/backend && npm run dev" "npm run dev:reservations"
scripts.build: npm run build:customer && npm run build:admin
scripts.migrate:all: npm run migrate && npm run migrate:admin && npm run migrate:ticketing && npm run migrate:reservations
scripts.lint: npm run lint:customer && npm run lint:admin
scripts.clean: npm run clean:customer && npm run clean:admin
scripts.clean:admin: cd admin-module/frontend && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../backend && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.clean:all: find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'dist' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run migrate:all && npm run seed
scripts.setup:dev: npm run install:all && echo 'Ready! Run: npm run dev'
